body_html:
I just came across this problem when I did

import tensorflow as tf
import mxnet as mx
import torch
import torchvison

Actually it looked a bit scary since a segment fault occurred after executing import torchvison. Anyway, the error disappeared if I changed the order a little bit.

import torch
import torchvision
import tensorflow as tf
import mxnet as mx
body_text:
I just came across this problem when I did
import tensorflow as tf
import mxnet as mx
import torch
import torchvison

Actually it looked a bit scary since a segment fault occurred after executing import torchvison. Anyway, the error disappeared if I changed the order a little bit.
import torch
import torchvision
import tensorflow as tf
import mxnet as mx
body:
I just came across this problem when I did
```
import tensorflow as tf
import mxnet as mx
import torch
import torchvison
```
Actually it looked a bit scary since a segment fault occurred after executing `import torchvison`. Anyway, the error disappeared if I changed the order a little bit.
```
import torch
import torchvision
import tensorflow as tf
import mxnet as mx
```
